summary: A nop-statement does not perform any operation.
details: A nop-statement should generate a nop bytecode instruction.
An optimizer is free to remove nop bytecode instructions.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    (F::println %22Before NOP%22);%0A%0A    nop;%0A%0A    (F::println %22After NOP%22);%0A}
